name: projects.tags
description: FABRIC tags as denoted by the key in key_value_pairs

api_endpoints.description: PUT: add specified tags to project if they don't already exist
DELETE: remove specified tags from project if they exist

key_value_pairs.VM.NoLimitCPU: allows to create VMs with X CPUs or more
key_value_pairs.VM.NoLimitRAM: allows to create VMs with X GB of RAM or more
key_value_pairs.VM.NoLimitDisk: allows to create VMs with X GB of disk or more
key_value_pairs.Component.GPU: allows to provision and attach GPU components
key_value_pairs.Component.FPGA: allows to provision and attach FPGA components
key_value_pairs.Component.SmartNIC: allows to provision and attach 25G and 100G dedicated SmartNIC components
key_value_pairs.Component.Storage: allows to create and attach rotating storage
key_value_pairs.Component.NVME: allows to provision and attach NVME components
key_value_pairs.Net.NoLimitBW: allows to provision links over X Gbps
key_value_pairs.Net.Peering: allows to create slices with public peering
key_value_pairs.Net.PortMirroring: allows to create slices that include port mirroring
key_value_pairs.Net.StitchPort.XXX: allows to create slices with stitch port with short name XXX
key_value_pairs.Net.AllStitchPorts: allows to create slices with any stitchport
key_value_pairs.Slice.Multisite: allows to create slices spanning multiple sites
key_value_pairs.Slice.NoLimitLifetime: allows to create slices with a lifetime beyond default limit X time units without the need to renew
